page_content: The page provides tax forms and guidelines for corporations and cooperatives for the year 2020 in PDF format.
The page provides documents related to the National and Council elections held on October 20, 2019, in PDF format.
The page provides various forms and guidelines for employers related to withholding tax, available in PDF format.
The page describes the organization and structure of the Solothurn Cantonal Parliament, including its commissions and factions.
The page announces that the Financial Commission (FIKO) has approved a commitment credit of 2.25 million Francs for the replacement of the cantonal school administration software.
The page provides information on leadership training programs for various roles within the civil protection services.
The page provides guidelines on what to do in case of a fire to protect people and animals.
